author: Rai Furniss-Greasley
description:
The town of Burnt Sparrow, setting for a new trilogy from Eric LaRocca and starting with We are Always Tender with our Dead, is a cursed place that doesn’t let go. Much like the townsfolk stuck there, you’ll find yourself returning to Burnt Sparrow long after you’ve put down the book. This is a queer, […]

The post REVIEW: We Are Always Tender with Our Dead by Eric LaRocca appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: We Are Always Tender with Our Dead by Eric LaRocca
